remarks: The pointwise limit of a sequence of measurable real-valued functions is measurable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
statement:
mbflim.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
mbflim.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
mbflim.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( n e. Z |-> B ) ~~> C ) $.
mbflim.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. Z ) -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
mbflimlem.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( n e. Z /\ x e. A ) ) -> B e. RR ) $.
mbflimlem $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. MblFn ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d Z n x $.
$d n ph x $.
